SecondSection.title: The Year of the 85th
SecondSection.description: Our story began 85 years ago, and it continues to inspire excellence and determination.

slide1.title: What we believe
slide1.description: We believe in enabling our people to realise their full potential by creating an inclusive, supportive and collaborative learning environment.

slide2.title: What We Believe
slide2.description: We believe in delivering meaningful social investment programmes to create sustainable benefits for Omani society.

slide3.title: What We Believe
slide3.description: We believe in delivering excellence, growth and sustainable value creation within and well beyond our industry.

FourthSection.subtitle: What we do
FourthSection.title: We Are Proud To Serve Oman
FourthSection.description: That drive to uncover the next frontier and focus on delivering excellence, growth, and sustainable value creation within and well beyond our industry.

accordion1.title: Our Mega Projects
accordion1.description: Our giant projects are delivering unprecedented value.

accordion2.title: Health And Safety
accordion2.description: Safety is the bedrock of all we do.

accordion3.title: Energy Transition
accordion3.description: We are working hard to be a net-zero business by 2050.

accordion4.title: Our People
accordion4.description: Our staff are PDO’s greatest asset.

FifthSection.title: 85 years of experience
FifthSection.description: PDO has 8,853 staff and over 52,000 contracting employees, a combined workforce made up of over 60 nationalities.
FifthSection.description2: We operate 202 producing oil fields, 43 gas fields, 29 production stations, more than 9,400 active wells, more than 33,000 kilometres of pipelines and flowlines and 230 operating units in our well engineering fleet.
